attributes.action: give British people under a certain income, a £50 energy voucher at Christmas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The disabled and the unemployed do not receive any help towards their energy bills, including cold-weather payments. This must affect their human rights. With 500,000 jobs in the economy and 2 million unemployed and counting, I feel the British Government needs to look at this again
